alert.note: Alert for Walsenburg Vicinity, Upper Huerfano River Basin Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 5:02PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Huerfano County through 545 PM MDT... At 501 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles north of Aguilar to Walsenburg. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Walsenburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
